item.title: This Week a new Samsung patent was published in Europe for future Rollable/Expandable Displays for Smartphones and Tablets - Patently Apple
item.description:
Samsung's New Patent for Rollable and Expandable Displays Unveiled

Publication Date: January 9, 2025 | Source: Patently Apple

Samsung has published a patent for innovative rollable and expandable display technologies for smartphones and tablets, showcasing potential designs for the future of mobile devices.

  • New prototypes of smartphones and tablets with foldable and rollable displays are set to be introduced at CES 2025.
  • The World IP Office published the Samsung patent application detailing various methodologies for rollable displays.
  • The patent suggests electronic devices are evolving past traditional rectangular shapes into more versatile designs.
  • Seven engineers are credited with the invention, indicating a strong team behind the development.
  • Beyond smartphones and tablets, the patent mentions applications for other device categories including medical devices and wearables.
"Electronic devices deviate from a uniform rectangular shape and are gradually changed into various shapes."

The development of rollable and expandable displays by Samsung signifies a major advancement in mobile technology, promising more versatile and innovative device designs.

item.title: Amazon Great Republic Day Sale begins on Jan 13: Expect up to 80% off on sunscreens, serums and more from top brands - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Amazon Great Republic Day Sale begins on Jan 13: Expect up to 80% off on sunscreens, serums and more from top brands

Date: January 10, 2025
Source: Hindustan Times

The Amazon Great Republic Day Sale launches on January 13, 2025, featuring significant discounts on renowned beauty brands and skincare products.

  • Up to 80% off on selected skincare products, including face washes and sunscreens.
  • Extra 15% off limited-time deals and a 10% instant discount for SBI Credit Card users.
  • Offers apply to a wide range of products from brands like The Derma Co, Cetaphil, and Bioderma.
  • Featured deals include discounts on moisturizers, face toners, and body washes.
“This sale is the perfect opportunity to enhance your skincare routine without overspending.”

The Amazon Great Republic Day Sale offers an excellent chance for shoppers to stock up on essential skincare products at discounted prices.

item.title: Deals: Poco X7 and X7 Pro now available, here are some alternatives too - GSMArena.com news - GSMArena.com
item.description:
Poco X7 and X7 Pro Now Available, Here Are Some Alternatives Too

Publication Date: October 2023 Source: GSM Arena

This week Xiaomi launched the new Poco X7 series which is readily available in the UK. The series includes the Poco X7 and Poco X7 Pro, with key differences in performance, battery, and pricing.

  • The Poco X7 Pro has a Dimensity 8400 Ultra chipset and 6,000mAh battery with 90W HyperCharge.
  • The display features a 6.67” 120Hz OLED panel with Dolby Vision and Gorilla Glass 7i.
  • The standard Poco X7 is cheaper, has a Dimensity 7300 Ultra chipset, and a smaller 5,110mAh battery with slower charging.
  • Alternatives include Poco F6 Pro, Xiaomi 14T, OnePlus Nord 4, Motorola Edge 50 Neo, and OnePlus Nord CE4 Lite.
“We may get a commission from qualifying sales.”

The launch of the Poco X7 series provides consumers with powerful options in the mid-range segment, alongside several noteworthy alternatives in price and features.

item.title: 5 things Grok AI can do for you: A quick guide - The Indian Express
item.description:
5 Things Grok AI Can Do For You: A Quick Guide

Date: 2023
Source: Indian Express

Grok AI is an innovative AI-powered chatbot launched by xAI that now provides access to users for generating texts, images, and performing searches. It initially started as a premium service but was made available to all users in December 2024.

  • Grok AI interacts through text prompts, holding conversations and generating images.
  • Users can upload documents for summarization and analysis.
  • It features real-time search capabilities to fetch news and product information.
  • Offers two modes—Regular for straightforward information and Fun for humorous interactions.
  • Includes image generation capabilities for creating hyperrealistic images.
  • Can fact-check tweets using real-time data on X.
  • Functions as a travel planner, creating detailed itineraries.
"Grok AI is designed to be a conversational partner equipped with a sense of humour."

In conclusion, Grok AI exemplifies the integration of cutting-edge AI technology into everyday tasks, making it a versatile tool for various users.

item.title: Critical security alert for Android 12 to 15 OS users: Update now to avoid major security risks - India TV News
item.description:
Critical Security Alert for Android 12 to 15 Users: Update Now

Publication Date: January 6, 2025 Source: India TV News

Google has issued a critical security alert for millions of users with Android devices running versions 12 to 15, urging immediate updates to avoid exposure to serious vulnerabilities.

  • 5 severe flaws identified in the January 2025 Android Security Bulletin.
  • Remote access risks and data breaches are significant threats linked to these vulnerabilities.
  • Users are encouraged to update to the latest patch and enable automatic updates.
“Delaying updates leaves devices exposed to hackers who exploit these flaws to steal sensitive information.”

Updating your Android device is crucial to protecting your data and ensuring optimal performance against cyber threats.

item.title: Xiaomi Pad 7 launched in India: 5 things to know - Moneycontrol
item.description:
Xiaomi Pad 7 launched in India: 5 things to know

Date: January 11, 2025 / Source: Moneycontrol

The Xiaomi Pad 7 is the latest tablet from Xiaomi, featuring an impressive set of specifications aimed at productivity and performance. It has a 3K display and a powerful processor.

  • 11.2-inch 3K display with 144Hz refresh rate.
  • Powered by Snapdragon 7+ Gen 3 chipset with up to 12GB of RAM.
  • 8,850mAh battery with 45W fast charging support.
  • Available in multiple variants starting from Rs 27,999.
  • Sale begins on January 13, 2025, with discounts available.
The Xiaomi Pad 7 features a 11.2-inch 3.2K LCD screen with up to 144Hz refresh rate, Dolby Vision HDR10 support, and comes equipped with a keyboard and stylus for enhanced productivity.

The launch of the Xiaomi Pad 7 signifies Xiaomi's continued focus on high-performance devices aimed at professionals and productivity-minded consumers.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 series India launch: Full specs, price and colour variants leaked ahead of January 22 debut | Mint - Mint
item.description:
Samsung Galaxy S25 series India launch: Full specs, price and colour variants leaked ahead of January 22 debut

Publication Date: January 2023    Source: Live Mint

Samsung is set to launch its flagship S25 lineup in India on January 22, with leaks revealing detailed specifications, colors, and pricing of the Galaxy S25, S25+, and S25 Ultra.

  • The Galaxy S25 and S25+ will be available in Mint, Iceblue, Silver Shadow, and Navy colors.
  • The S25 Ultra may have colors like Titanium Black and Titanium Silver Blue.
  • Galaxy S25 features a 6.2-inch display, while S25+ has a 6.7-inch display, both with a 120Hz refresh rate.
  • All models powered by Snapdragon 8 Elite processor with varying RAM and storage options.
  • Pricing starts from €973 for the 128GB Galaxy S25 up to €1,948 for the 1TB S25 Ultra.
“The top end Galaxy S25 Ultra will reportedly be priced at €1,557 for the 256GB model.”

This launch will gather significant attention as Samsung unveils its latest smartphone technology.

item.title: Reliance Jio unleashed 5.5G network in partnership with OnePlus: Speeds up to 10 Gbps - India TV News
item.description:
Reliance Jio Unleashed 5.5G Network in Partnership with OnePlus: Speeds Up to 10 Gbps

Publication Date: January 11, 2025 Source: India TV News

Reliance Jio, led by Mukesh Ambani, has introduced its groundbreaking ‘5.5G’ network in India. Developed in collaboration with OnePlus, this next-generation technology promises lightning-fast speeds, unmatched reliability, and a seamless internet experience.

Key Points:

  • Download Speeds: Up to 10 Gbps for instant downloads.
  • Upload Speeds: Up to 1 Gbps for quicker data sharing.
  • Low Latency: Faster response times for gaming and video calls.
  • Robust Connections: Stable performance even in crowded areas.
At the launch event, Jio demonstrated the capabilities of 5.5G. While traditional 5G reached speeds of 277 Mbps, Jio’s 5.5G network clocked over 1,014 Mbps.

The 5.5G network is designed to revolutionize mobile internet with key benefits such as faster downloads, lag-free streaming, enhanced gaming, and superior call quality.

Conclusion: Reliance Jio's 5.5G network represents a significant leap forward in mobile connectivity in India, promising a better overall user experience.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S23 5G gets 55 per cent off on Flipkart: Should you buy it? - India TV News
item.description:
Samsung Galaxy S23 5G gets 55 per cent off on Flipkart: Should you buy it?

Publication Date: January 10, 2025 Source: India TV News

Flipkart is offering a significant discount on the Samsung Galaxy S23 5G ahead of the Republic Day Sale, allowing consumers to purchase the 256GB variant for just Rs 42,999 instead of Rs 95,999.

  • 55% discount on the Samsung Galaxy S23 5G.
  • Additional 5% cashback on purchases with Flipkart Axis Bank Credit Cards.
  • Exchange offers providing up to Rs 39,000 off for trading in an old device.
  • Key features include a Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 chipset, IP68 rating, 6.1-inch Dynamic AMOLED screen, and triple rear camera setup.
"This is the perfect opportunity to buy the Samsung Galaxy S23 5G with its premium features now available at an unbeatable price."

In conclusion, the Samsung Galaxy S23 5G represents a compelling purchase option for those in the market for a new smartphone, offering both significant savings and advanced features.

item.title: iPhone 17 Pro, iPhone 17 Pro Max likely to come with three 48-megapixel cameras - Moneycontrol
item.description:
iPhone 17 Pro, iPhone 17 Pro Max likely to come with three 48-megapixel cameras

Date: January 11, 2025 / Source: Moneycontrol

The upcoming iPhone 17 Pro models are expected to make significant advancements in camera technology, featuring a total of three 48-megapixel cameras.

  • The iPhone 17 Pro models will include a 48MP main Fusion lens.
  • A 48MP Ultra Wide lens will be part of the set-up.
  • A new 48MP Tetraprism telephoto lens will replace the existing 12MP lens from the iPhone 16 Pro.
  • A 24MP front camera will enhance selfie capabilities, up from the 12MP on the previous model.
“Want a great camera phone but the Vivos, OPPOs, and Samsungs are not your thing? You should wait for the iPhone 17 series.”

The iPhone 17 series promises impressive camera enhancements that will appeal to photography enthusiasts.

item.title: AI comes down from the cloud as chips get smarter - ET Manufacturing
item.description:
AI Comes Down from the Cloud as Chips Get Smarter

Published On Jan 11, 2025 by AFP

Artificial intelligence is moving from data centers to "the edge" as computer makers build the technology into laptops, robots, cars, and more devices closer to home.

  • The Consumer Electronics Show (CES) showcased PCs and devices boasting AI chips.
  • Prominent features included powerful "AI PCs" with cloud-like performance.
  • Nvidia announced advancements in AI-capable graphics processing units (GPUs).
  • Fast-tracked growth of personal AI supercomputers for consumer use.
  • Market predictions indicate AI-capable PCs will make up 40% of shipments by the end of the year.
“AI will be mainstream in every application for every industry.” – Jensen Huang, CEO of Nvidia

This evolution in AI technology marks a significant shift towards localized processing, enhancing the capabilities of personal computing devices.

item.title: Xiaomi Pad 7 launched in India with nano-texture display: Check price, features and more | Mint - Mint
item.description:
Xiaomi Pad 7 Launched in India with Innovative Display Features

Publication Date: January 2024 | Source: Live Mint

Xiaomi has officially launched its updated Xiaomi Pad 7 in India, introducing enhanced features aimed at providing a premium tablet experience at competitive prices.

Xiaomi Pad 7 Pricing

The Xiaomi Pad 7 comes with a unique Nano-Texture Glass Display, offered in the top-end variant, and prices range from ₹26,999 to ₹31,999 across different configurations.

Xiaomi Pad 7 Specifications

The tablet boasts an 11.2-inch 3.2K display with a high refresh rate, supported by a powerful Snapdragon chipset, and features designed for enhanced usability.

  • Available in three variants: 8GB RAM + 128GB storage for ₹26,999
  • 12GB RAM + 256GB storage for ₹29,999
  • 12GB RAM + 256GB variant with Nano-Texture Glass for ₹31,999

Accessories

A range of new accessories has been unveiled to complement the tablet, enhancing user experience further.

“The Pad 7 will be available from January 13, while the Nano-Texture variant will go on sale from February 2025.”

item.title: 4 workouts that test the limits of your fitness and strength | Mint - Mint
item.description:
4 Workouts That Challenge Your Fitness and Strength

Publication Date: January 2023 | Source: Mint

This article highlights four workouts designed to test your limits in fitness and strength, helping you to identify weaknesses and tailor your approach to fitness goals.

  • Emphasizes testing limits during the first month of the year.
  • Discusses common workout frustrations and weaknesses.
  • Encourages maximizing strengths through targeted workouts.
  • Offers curated workout suggestions to assess fitness levels.
"Knowing weaknesses will eventually lead you to maximize your strengths."

These workouts serve as a guide to push boundaries and achieve fitness aspirations effectively.

item.description:
Amazon Sale 2025: Up to 40% Price Drop on 4K TVs

Date: January 10, 2025 Source: HT Tech

The Amazon Great Republic Day Sale is set to begin on January 13, 2025, offering significant price reductions on a variety of 4K TVs for Prime Members.

  • Sale starts on January 13, 2025, for Prime Members.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra Leaks: Upcoming Flagship Smartphone Might Offer Macro Photography & Improved Video Quality - ABP Live
item.description:
Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra Leaks: Upcoming Flagship Smartphone Might Offer Macro Photography & Improved Video Quality

Publication Date: January 10, 2025 | Source: Ahmed Qwaider

Samsung is preparing to launch its Galaxy S25 Ultra with advanced camera features, expected to enhance video and macro photography capabilities significantly.

  • The Galaxy S25 Ultra may support high-resolution video recording with reduced noise.
  • An improved macro mode is said to provide four times better clarity.
  • Expected features include an auto-eraser to remove unwanted sounds in videos.
  • The camera setup will likely maintain a quad rear camera configuration with a 200-megapixel primary sensor.
  • The smartphone is rumored to have a 6.86-inch Dynamic LTPO AMOLED display with a peak brightness of 2,600 nits.
  • It is expected to be powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset and feature a 5,000mAh battery.
“While shooting video, you will get better results with less noise.” — Ahmed Qwaider

The Galaxy S25 Ultra is set to be officially unveiled at the Galaxy Unpacked event on January 22, with pre-reservations already live in India.

item.title: More Samsung Galaxy S25, S25+, and S25 Ultra renders leak - GSMArena.com news - GSMArena.com
item.description:
More Samsung Galaxy S25, S25+, and S25 Ultra Renders Leak

Publication Date: Today | Source: GSM Arena

The recent leaks of the Samsung Galaxy S25 series have unveiled crucial design elements and specifications of the upcoming flagship models, including the Galaxy S25, S25+, and S25 Ultra.

  • Legendary leaker Evan Blass released three new renders representing each model.
  • The Galaxy S25 Ultra features minor curves, a design change from its predecessor.
  • Camera circle-island designs are different across the three models.
  • The devices are rumored to be powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset.
  • The S25 is expected to include 12GB of RAM and a 50 MP ultrawide camera for the Ultra model.
These renders do not introduce anything new but reconfirm the design for the umpteenth time.

In conclusion, while these leaks provide a clearer view of the Galaxy S25 series, they primarily reiterate previously rumored details rather than revealing significant new information.

item.title: iPhone SE 4 Expected to Arrive With OLED Display, A18 Chip, and More - Jobaaj Stories
item.description:
iPhone SE 4 Expected to Arrive With OLED Display, A18 Chip, and More

Publication Date: April 2025

The iPhone SE 4 is expected to feature an OLED display, A18 chip, 48MP camera, and 5G modem, with a price under $500, launching by April 2025.

Apple is reportedly preparing to release the fourth-generation iPhone SE in the first half of this year. Leaked details have revealed some exciting specifications for the upcoming model. The iPhone SE 4 is rumored to feature a 6.06-inch full-HD+ OLED display with a 60Hz refresh rate, offering a sharp and vibrant viewing experience. It may also come with a notch design and Face ID support for improved security.

  • Expected to run on Apple's A18 Bionic chip.
  • 48-megapixel rear camera for excellent photo quality.
  • 5G modem for enhanced connectivity.
  • Price expected to be under $500.
  • Launch anticipated by April 2025.
“Fans of Apple's budget-friendly offerings will certainly be excited about this update!”

In conclusion, the iPhone SE 4 is shaping up to be an attractive option for consumers seeking a powerful yet affordable smartphone.

item.title: LG’s new four-stack OLED could be a game changer for TVs — here’s why - Tom's Guide
item.description:
LG’s New Four-Stack OLED Could Revolutionize TV Technology

Publication Date: January 2025 | Source: Tom's Guide

At CES 2025, LG has unveiled its new four-stack OLED technology, which promises to significantly enhance TV brightness and color accuracy compared to previous models. The G5 OLED offers 40% higher brightness than its predecessor, the G4, positioning it as a leading competitor in the premium TV market.

  • LG has transitioned from its Micro Lens Array (MLA) panel technology to a four-stack OLED design.
  • The new panel architecture allows for increased brightness and improved color accuracy.
  • Panasonic is adopting similar technology, with a focus on performance improvements.
  • LG’s G5 OLED is expected to achieve over 2,000 nits of brightness.
  • Energy consumption for the new 65-inch G5 is rated at 164W, significantly lower than the G4's 209W.

"I’ve often come across LG OLEDs that exhibit a subtle pink- or green-colored tint... This does not seem to be the case with the G5 after initial viewing." Michael Desjardin

The advancements in LG’s OLED technology not only highlight improvements in display performance but also mark a competitive shift in the industry landscape.

item.title: Reno13 Series Campaign by OPPO and Famous Innovations Celebrates Friendship with Innovation - MediaNews4U
item.description:
OPPO Launches Reno13 Series Campaign Celebrating Friendship and Innovation

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Medianews4u

OPPO, in collaboration with Famous Innovations, has debuted a new campaign for the Reno13 Series, inspired by the film Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara. The campaign highlights the blend of nostalgia and innovation.

  • The campaign features actors Siddhant Chaturvedi, Ishaan Khatter, and Vedang Raina, showcasing themes of friendship and adventure.
  • Each film emphasizes different features of the Reno13 Series, such as AI Unblur, Underwater Photography, AI LivePhoto, and AI Reflection Remove.
  • Mithila Saraf from Famous Innovations emphasizes the campaign's connection to popular culture and emotional resonance.
  • OPPO continues to focus on the emotional connection with its audience while pushing innovation boundaries.
“This campaign demonstrates the power of leveraging popular culture to forge meaningful connections for brands.” - Mithila Saraf, CEO at Famous Innovations

The Reno13 Series campaign is set to enhance the user experience while keeping the essence of treasured moments at its core.

item.title: Garena Free Fire MAX Redeem Codes for January 11: Unlock free Diamonds, skins and more - India TV News
item.description:
Garena Free Fire MAX Redeem Codes for January 11: Unlock Free Diamonds, Skins, and More

Date: January 11, 2025 Source: India TV News

Garena Free Fire MAX has released new redeem codes for January 11, 2025, allowing players to access exclusive items like bundles, emotes, rare skins, and diamonds for a limited time. Players should redeem these codes quickly as they are only valid for 24 hours.

Key Points:

  • New daily redeem codes available for Free Fire MAX.
  • Codes unlock exclusive bundles, emotes, and diamonds.
  • List of active codes: FFMSTXP2FWCK, FFSUTXVQF2NR, FFXT7SW9KG2M, FFNRWTQPFDZ9, FFSP9XQ2TNZK, YF6WN9QSFTHX, PXTXFCNSV2YK, HQK6FX2YT9GG.
  • Players must redeem codes within 24 hours.
  • Instructions provided for redeeming codes on the official website.

Notable Quotes or Statistics:

“One must remember that these codes are valid for 24 hours only and players need to redeem them quickly before they expire.”

Conclusion:

The latest redeem codes for Garena Free Fire MAX present a great opportunity for players to enhance their in-game experience, though time is of the essence as the offers are limited.
